titles.title: FAIR TOW Act
To amend title 23, United States Code, to exempt covered heavy-duty tow and recovery vehicles from certain weight limitations, and for other purposes.
Fair Action for Interstate Recovery Vehicles on Truck Operating Weights Act
FAIR TOW Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Highways and Transit.

bill.summary:
Fair Action for Interstate Recovery Vehicles on Truck Operating Weights Act or the FAIR TOW Act
Exempts certain heavy-duty tow and recovery vehicles traveling on federal highways from federal vehicle weight limitations.
